intro:
Four-Zone Rhythm Game!
Feel the beat with simple controls!
description:
This four-zone rhythm game splits the screen into four areas, creating a clean and intuitive playfield.
Notes move inward from the edges—hit them with perfect timing to keep the rhythm flowing.
Controller and touchscreen controls are both supported, letting you choose how you play.
With only single notes and simultaneous inputs, the gameplay is easy to pick up but tough to master.

The story is set in a digital world.
Strange incidents begin to surface inside a social rhythm game—avatars are taken, and unknown entities start spreading.
The narrative unfolds through chat-based conversations, slowly uncovering the truth behind the events.
Beyond the chat, the story moves forward—quietly, but with purpose.

Challenge online rankings and push your skills toward a perfect 1,000,000-point score.
A rhythm game that’s simple, satisfying, and seriously challenging.
